title: AfterShock
description: Ali and Caden Morgan were not prepared for what happened months ago. Their lives are upside following the death of their mother, a best friend and the appearance of their father, a man they thought had abandoned them long ago.Learning the truth about their parentâ€™s relationship and what they went through when first married is shocking to say least. Now Ali and Caden must learn to trust a man that hasn't been in the lives for over seventeen years, how to use and control their powers, bring down an advanced Alien race and obtain an antidote to save humanity.Piece of cake...right?
author: Lisa Arrington
